Package org.projecthusky.validation.service

@DefaultQualifier(value=org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.NonNull.class, locations={PARAMETER,RETURN,FIELD}) package org.projecthusky.validation.service
The validation services package. It includes classes for XML Schema, Schematron and PDF validation.

By default, parameters and return values are annotated with NonNull except for the generated package. Nullable values are specifically annotated with Nullable.

Author:
Quentin Ligier
